vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a CC Community Commercial Subdistrict and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a commercial amusement (inside) use on property zoned an NC Neighborhood Commercial Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas/Fair Park Special Purpose District, on the southeast corner of South Malcolm X Boulevard and Birmingham Avenue
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval of a CC Community Commercial Subdistrict; and approval of a Specific Use Permit for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z190-140(PD)
